functionalityReviewMarks.title: Sign Up and Sign In functionality
User has an ability to sign out
Unauthorized user cannot access any page other than Sign Up or Sign In
When user goes to a trip page, corresponding data is loaded and displayed
If asynchronous operations are failed, user sees an error notification
While the data is being loaded, the user sees loader
If 401 error occurs, the user is logged out

additionalMarks.title: Usage of functional approaches and patterns

codeReviewPoints.title: Variables that do not change must be declared via const
Do not forget to delete console logs
It's better to remove unnecessary comments from the code
Many if and else if complicate the readability of the code. Sometimes it's better to move logic to another function
